document_data.mainbody:
he Shield Faces North was one of the oldest taverns located in the city of Zhentil Keep during the midâ€“14 century DR before that citys destruction.
The tavern was located near the center of Zhentil Keeps Harbor District along Harbor Street near the waterfront.
The Shield Faces North was a popular tavern for those wishing to enjoy a quiet evening. Among the usual crowd were halflings, dwarves, and older merchants. The serene atmosphere within the tavern existed because the strict access to the Harbor District prevented most of Zhentil Keeps scum from entering.
